module.name: ebay
module.description: Exporta fácilmente tus productos desde PrestaShop a eBay, una de las plataformas de compraventa más grandes del mundo, y consigue nuevos clientes para acelerar tus ventas
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Exporta fácilmente tus productos desde PrestaShop a eBay, una de las plataformas de compraventa más grandes del mundo, y consigue nuevos clientes para acelerar tus ventas. Abre gratis* una tienda en eBay ​ahora !
module.additional_description: • Puedes desarrollar un canal de ventas rentable con eBay como nueva vía de acceso al mercado. • Tus productos serán vistos por una audiencia mundial de más de 100 millones de compradores potenciales. • Puedes crear anuncios y vender artículos a través de ambos canales desde un mismo lugar. • Podrás gestionar tus pedidos a través de ambos canales, con lo que evitarás el riesgo de vender por encima de tu nivel de inventario.

module.name: envoimoinscher
module.description: Este módulo sólo está disponible para la Francia actual. Para obtener más información, por favor lea la descripción francés
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo sólo está disponible para la Francia actual. Para obtener más información, por favor lea la descripción francés .

module.name: hipay
module.description: La plataforma Hipay te permite gestionar las transacciones online sin VAD (distance-selling contract) y con un sistema antifraude integrado
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: La plataforma Hipay te permite gestionar las transacciones online sin VAD (distance-selling contract) y con un sistema antifraude integrado. Puedes tener acceso a todas las soluciones de pago locales e internacionales (Visa, MasterCard, ING, Bancontact Mistercash, Sofort, PayShop, Boleto Bancario, Ideal, Sisal...)

module.name: mailjet
module.description: Se utiliza Mailjet para enviar correos electrónicos y newsletter? Ahora, envía correo electrónico automático de su tienda online PrestaShop con su plataforma de enrutamiento Mailjet! Este módulo le
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Se utiliza Mailjet para enviar correos electrónicos y newsletter? Ahora, envía correo electrónico automático de su tienda online PrestaShop con su plataforma de enrutamiento Mailjet! Este módulo le permite enviar todos los e-mails de su tienda en línea PrestaShop a través de la plataforma de correo electrónico Mailjet. Para esto sólo tiene que introducir su clave de API Mailjet y su contraseña. También puede probar la configuración del módulo. Nota: Una suscripción a un servicio de terceros es necesario para utilizar el módulo. Gracias por suscribirse a Mailjet antes de utilizar este módulo.
module.additional_description: Con Mailjet, usted puede optimizar su capacidad de entrega de correos electrónicos para que llegen a la bandeja de entrada sin terminar como spams. Instala la extensión oficial Mailjet para PrestaShop, para tener aceso a : Estadísticas: Las cifras de ventas en tiempo real y los ingresos netos por cada newsletter. Descubre quien abrió e hizo clic en sus correos electrónicos, cuales fueron devueltos los y quien cancelado la suscripción a sus listas. Crea gráficos, datos de exportación, y mucho más! Planifica eventos de correos electrónicos basados en el comportamiento del cliente (ofertas promocionales para los cumpleaños, la compra abandonada, encuestas, etc.). Crea segmentos específicos de clientes para enviar contenido destinado a aumentar las tasa de apertura y la tasa de clic Elimine automáticamente unsubscribers de sus listas de contactos y de sus listas de newsletter para mantener intacta su reputación de entrega Personalice sus correos con cualquier propiedades de sus listas de contactos Crea y gestiona todas las campañas Mailjet y contactos directamente desde su tienda PrestaShop

module.name: moneybookers
module.description: Más de 36 millones de clientes ya confían en Skrill
module.author: MyBBservices
module.description_full: Más de 36 millones de clientes ya confían en Skrill. Porque pueden enviar y recibir dinero en 200 países de todo el mundo y 40 divisas diferentes, con máxima seguridad y a bajo coste, sin revelar sus detalles personales ni financieros.
module.additional_description: ¿Sabe por qué más de 158.000 comerciantes ya usan Skrill?Sin costes de apertura ni tarifas mensualesProcesamiento de pagos con tarjeta de crédito y débitoHasta 100 opciones adicionales de pagos localesMáximos estándares de seguridad (nivel 1 de PCI DSS)Incluye verificaciones contra fraudesApertura de cuenta gratuita en 72 horas

module.name: ogone
module.description: Servicios de pago Ingenico*: Servicios de pago online para mejorar la conversión Ofrecemos nuestras innovadoras soluciones de comercio electrónico a más de 160 000 clientes de Europa y de todo el mun
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Servicios de pago Ingenico*: Servicios de pago online para mejorar la conversión Ofrecemos nuestras innovadoras soluciones de comercio electrónico a más de 160 000 clientes de Europa y de todo el mundo * Conocido anteriormente como Ogone
module.additional_description: Al elegir los servicios de pago Ingenico como socio de pagos, su empresa disfrutará de un gran número de ventajas: Procesamos pagos de forma segura a través de Internet. Tanto si dispone de una tienda en Internet, para dispositivos móviles o si procesa pedidos por teléfono, le ayudaremos a aceptar y recibir pagos, así como a proteger a su empresa contra el fraude.

module.name: paypal
module.description: Responda a las necesidades de sus clientes: ofrézcales una de las mejores soluciones de pago
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Responda a las necesidades de sus clientes: ofrézcales una de las mejores soluciones de pago. Con más de 143 millones de cuentas activas en todo el mundo, PayPal es uno de los líderes en soluciones de pago en Internet y en dispositivos móviles. Disponible en 193 países y en 26 divisas, PayPal es también una de las formas de pago por Internet más reconocidas y fiables, según los clientes.

module.name: mondialrelay
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Mondial Relay, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3. Entregando más de 40 millones de paquetes al año, mediante su red de 6.000 puntos de recogida (“Points Relais” en Francia, Bélgica y Luxemburgo, “Punto Pack” en España), o vía entrega a domicilio, Mondial Relay es hoy uno de los más importantes actores del sector de las entregas a particulares. 12 de los 15 más importantes sites E-Commerce franceses han elegido los servicios de Mondial Relay debido a la calidad de su oferta y el control total de los procesos logísticos. Mondial Relay quiere compartir y desarrollar este saber hacer con todos los e-comerciantes, cualquier sea su nivel de actividad, sin imposición de volúmenes mínimos. Ahora esta oferta de servicios está disponible en Prestashop. Con el acceso a las mismas soluciones de entrega en puntos de recogida, hasta la fecha reservadas a nuestras grandes cuentas, sus clientes tendrán a partir de hoy más opciones, y podrán escoger la entrega de sus pedidos en una tienda de conveniencia beneficiándose de la red más amplia a nivel europeo, con el mejor nivel de calidad posible (franjas horarias, ubicaciones).
module.additional_description: Con este módulo, usted tendrá una gama más amplia de métodos de envío, los clientes apreciarán la oportunidad de ser entregados en las tiendas, lo que mejorará su tasa de conversión.

module.name: tntcarrier
module.description: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language
module.author: Infostrates
module.description_full: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with TNT. To read the description of this module, please select French language.

module.name: trustedshops
module.description: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Este módulo se ofrece por Trusted Shops, que ya está integrado en la versión 1.4 de PrestaShop. Descargar de forma gratuita a la versión 1.3. Trusted Shop es el sello de confianza europeo del comercio en línea, le permite plantificar un ambiente de confianza y de seguridad ideal a los clientes. Con el sistema “evaluación cliente Trusted Shop” los clientes tienen la oportunidad de evaluar las prestaciones de su tienda en línea. Despúes, estas informaciones están compiladas y una nota media está atribuida simbolizada por estrellas directamente fijadas en la página web. Ese módulo refuerza la confianza de sus visitantes con respecto a su página web y le conducirá a encargar más fácilmente, lo que aumentará el índice de transformación de su tienda en línea. Descarga pronto Trusted Shops e aprovecha de condiciones especiales en calidad de usuario PrestaShop!
module.additional_description: Genuine reviews from real people. Online shoppers can enter some personal data to give their reviews a social proof. Customers will trust you even more. Upload orders from previous customers and receive reviews within hours. Or collect reviews automatically with every purchase of your customers.

module.name: authorizeaim
module.description: Authorize.net es un mòdulo que le permite aceptar los pagos por tarjeta bancaria y por cheques electrónicos de manera rápida y barata
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Authorize.net es un mòdulo que le permite aceptar los pagos por tarjeta bancaria y por cheques electrónicos de manera rápida y barata. Hoyendia, màs de 305 000 comerciantes confían en esta solución líder en el mercado para el tratamiento de los pagos en línea y de soluciones de prevención a las fraudas. Mas informaciones en el sitio oficial de Authoriza.net Videos: http://www.authorize.net/demos ﻿﻿

module.name: cashondelivery
module.description: Aceptar pagos contra reembolso
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Aceptar pagos contra reembolso

module.name: ganalytics
module.description: Integrar Google Analytics script en su tienda en línea
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Integrar Google Analytics script en su tienda en línea.
module.additional_description: An ad click here, a page view there, a video watched on a tablet before bed... but which one clinched the sale? Google Analytics has the latest in full-credit measurement, so you see all the stops people take on the road to action. The result: a measurable way to improve campaigns and reach new audiences as they go through their days.

module.name: shoppingfluxexport
module.description: Shopping Feed is a feed management system, enables online stores to promote and sell their products on price comparison websites and marketplaces
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shopping Feed is a feed management system, enables online stores to promote and sell their products on price comparison websites and marketplaces.Enjoy 1-month free trial now !

module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Offer your customers, different delivery methods with UPS

module.description: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Provides an automated method to upgrade your shop to the latest PrestaShop version
module.additional_description: Enjoy the benefits of version 1.6 of PrestaShop in one click with this module that allows you to update easily your online store!

module.name: socolissimo
module.description: Este módulo sólo está disponible para la Francia actual. Para obtener más información, por favor lea la descripción francés
module.author: Quadra Informatique
module.description_full: Este módulo sólo está disponible para la Francia actual. Para obtener más información, por favor lea la descripción francés .
module.additional_description: Usted ellos y ofrecen la posibilidad de elegir su modo de entrega a domicilio (buzon de recuperación o en persona, con la posibilidad de la entrega con cita previa en la noche) o fuera de casa (en el espacio Cityssimo en la oficina de correos de su elección o una de las tiendas locales de nuestra red de socios).

module.name: gamification
module.description: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: Become an e-commerce expert within the blink of an eye!

module.name: gadwords
module.description: Con la publicidad de Google, Google AdWords, tu negocio pordrá ser visible en Internet y así encontrar a nuevos clientes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Con la publicidad de Google, Google AdWords, tu negocio pordrá ser visible en Internet y así encontrar a nuevos clientes. Y además, gracias a nuestro nuevo acuerdo, te regalamos 75€* para tu primera campaña de publicidad! ¡Date prisa y crea tu primera campaña hoy!
module.additional_description: ¿Quieres conseguir nuevos clientes? ¡En Prestashop te ayudamos a conseguirlo con nuestro nuevo acuerdo con Google! Con la publicidad de Google, Google AdWords, tu negocio pordrá ser visible en Internet y así encontrar a nuevos clientes. Y además, gracias a nuestro nuevo acuerdo , te regalamos 75€* para tu primera campaña de publicidad! Google te regala 75€* para tu primera campaña de Google AdWords cuando gastes tus primeros 25€. Llama gratis al 900 814 546.

module.name: firstdata
module.description: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Accept Credit card payments today with First Data (Visa, Mastercard, Amex, Discover, etc.)﻿!   Fast. Secure. Reliable. PrestaShop and First Data have teamed up as industry leaders to help your business save money in online payment acceptance. With over 40 years of payment processing experience, Express Merchant Processing Solutions (EMPS) — powered by First Data has helped millions of businesses like yours bring fast, secure, effortless payments to their customers and affordable support—regardless of size.

module.name: pagseguro
module.description: PagSeguro offers the largest variety of payment terms available in the market. There are over 20 options available to the buyers, such as: online debit, bank slips and the PagSeguro credit card
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PagSeguro offers the largest variety of payment terms available in the market. There are over 20 options available to the buyers, such as: online debit, bank slips and the PagSeguro credit card.

module.name: paypalusa
module.description: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México y en los EE.UU
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: PayPal es la forma más fácil, rápida y segura de enviar y recibir pagos en línea. Es uno de los principales impulsores del comercio electrónico en México y en los EE.UU.

module.name: sendinblue
module.description: SendinBlue: El plug-todo-en-uno para sus correos electrónicos y SMS (marketing y transaccional)
module.author: SendinBlue
module.description_full: SendinBlue: El plug-todo-en-uno para sus correos electrónicos y SMS (marketing y transaccional). Sincronice sus contactos con PrestaShop para SendinBlue, cree fácilmente hermosas campañas de correo electrónico y comunique con sus clientes
module.additional_description: Con SendinBlue, podrá :Sincronizar automáticamente sus contactos en SendinBlue e importar las ventasCrear y enviar hermosos boletinesOptimizar las recepciones en la bandeja de entrega de sus correos electrónicos transaccionales (confirmación de registro, control, etc.)Seguir los resultados de sus envíos en tiempo realDisfrutar de un servicio al cliente por teléfono o correo electrónico Vea nuestro tutorial : https://resources.sendinblue.com/es/plugin-prestashop/

module.name: shopgate
module.description: Shopgate le permite disponer de una versión móvil para su tienda así como apps nativas para iOS y Android
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Shopgate le permite disponer de una versión móvil para su tienda así como apps nativas para iOS y Android. Nuestra solución es recomendada por PrestaShop puesto que se integra perfectamente en su tienda online mediante un simple módulo. Integrar su tienda toma tan sólo unas horas ¡sin necesidad de desembolso alguno!﻿﻿
module.additional_description: Usar Shopgate es la forma más rápida para que sus clientes vean cumplidas sus expectativas. Con Shopgate, podrá convertir a sus visitantes en clientes desde el móvil: una carga rápida, optimizado para pantallas táctiles, una navegación clara, métodos de pago preparados para el móvil, SEO y localizador de tiendas mediante GPS.

module.name: realexredirect
module.description: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page
module.author: Coccinet
module.description_full: Realex Payments Redirect for Prestashop enables you to process transactions from all major credit and debit cards through our Hosted Payment Page. If you don't already have a Realex account, you may apply for one on our website or call us on 020 3178 5370. ﻿
module.additional_description: Download for free to benefit from great features such as: Unrivalled Customer Support﻿﻿ 3DSecure & Fraud Card Storage (RealVault) Dynamic Currency Conversion

module.name: sofortbanking
module.description: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.author: Touchdesign
module.description_full: Attract more customers by offering SOFORT Banking as an additional payment method in your checkout!
module.additional_description: Attractive conditionsEasy integrationNo registration required for your customersAccustomed use of your customers’ familiar online banking detailsSecurity thanks to a multi-level online banking authentication procedureReal-time transaction confirmation

module.name: ecopresto
module.description: ¿Usted comienza su comercio electrónico y está buscando productos para vender? ¿Ya es ecommerciante y está buscando productos para complementar sus líneas sin necesidad de adquirir acciones adicionale
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ¿Usted comienza su comercio electrónico y está buscando productos para vender? ¿Ya es ecommerciante y está buscando productos para complementar sus líneas sin necesidad de adquirir acciones adicionales? Así Ecopresto es para usted! Ecopresto, leading dropshipping market place, ofrece acceso en unos pocos clics a decenas de miles de referencias (deporte, ocio, belleza, lencería, decoración, hogar, jardín, bienestar). Con el módulo, se centran en sus ventas, la tecnología está bajo control. ﻿ Por menos de 1 € por día y sin compromiso se accede à nuestro catálogo.
module.additional_description: Elija entre decenas de miles de productos en dropshippingPrimero vende y luego pagaSu venta se envía directamente a su cliente ... y de nuevo vende!

module.name: desjardins
module.description: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: An easy and effective way for PrestaShop users to create their online store at very competitive prices.

module.name: simplifycommerce
module.description: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify Commerce, an online payment solution, features a low, flat rate with no extra fees, two-day funding and major brand acceptance. Sign up takes minutes. With easy PrestaShop installation, your business can start selling right away.
module.additional_description: Built by MasterCard, a global leader in the payment industry, our merchants benefit from:Fast merchant signup in minutesSimple, flat 2.85% + 30₵ rate provided by acquirer with no hidden feesOmni-channel payment solution for website, mobile and eCommerce storeAccepting major card brandsQuick two-day fundingHighest Level 1 PCI certification

module.name: boxdropshipment
module.description: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You can now offer fast and safe shipping in a single click thanks to boxdrop ® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office.﻿
module.additional_description: Stop loosing time with the shipment handling in your shop with boxdrop® eLogistics (transport and delivery)﻿.﻿ boxdrop® eLogistics: Shipping & automatic Tracking from your Back Office - adds a fully integrated shipment subsystem to your PrestaShop for free. Simply group your goods into parcels and generate shipment documents and a pickup request with a single click. To ensure a safe and fast delivery, all shipments are being handled by DHL, the world leader in logistic. No need for a lengthy sign-up process with sales representatives, simply create a boxdrop account and you are good to go.

module.name: payplug
module.displayName: PayPlug - pago en línea sencillo y seguro
module.description: Con PayPlug, el pago en línea es más sencillo que nunca. Esta solución francesa de pago en línea se utiliza con o sin un contrato de venta a distancia y se instala con un par de clics
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Con PayPlug, el pago en línea es más sencillo que nunca. Esta solución francesa de pago en línea se utiliza con o sin un contrato de venta a distancia y se instala con un par de clics.
module.additional_description: Nuestra moderna e intuitiva solución te permite mejorar tu tasa de conversión gracias a unas características y a una ergonomía que están pensadas específicamente para el comercio electrónico. No pierdas más ventas y simplifica tus pagos en línea gracias a PayPlug:Pago rápido sin inscripciónDiseño moderno y perfeccionadoDetección automática del tipo de tarjeta

module.name: yousticeresolutionsystem
module.description: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Youstice is a customer service tool. It helps retailers to process all claims and resolve them quickly and efficiently. This module integrates Youstice in your online store, making it easy to use by customers who want to complain about a service or a product.  Youstice plugin is only available for French Merchants
module.additional_description: From November, companies will be able to acquire the new Customer satisfaction management package, which includes the Youstice module, as well as protection against cost of unresolved disputes that customers might escalate to ODR (online dispute resolution) bodies. The package, offered jointly by Youstice in cooperation with AXA Protection Juridique and Prestashop meets the requirements of the  new French law on consumer disputes, while optimizing the budget of your customer service. For more information, check www.youstice.com/fr/lepack The package is only available for French companies.  Advantages: - Youstice`s customer service module plus coverage against legal disputes - Compliant with the new French consumer law - Free Trial-Period (45 days), without risk

module.name: klikandpay
module.description: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Klik & Pay is a holistic secured payment solution accessible via PC, tablets and/or smartphone. Partners with many Banks and International acquirers, Klik & Pay assists its merchants for 15 years, in France, Europe and all over the World. Whatever your industry, we have a solution for you:
module.additional_description: No start-up fees or monthly subscriptionOnly 1.45% and 0.3 € per transactionA team available to help you secure your transactions and increase your conversion rate.

module.name: dpdpoland
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface. DPD Poland offers the highest quality of services, which will contribute to your clients’ satisfaction. The DPD official module enables complete shipment management, allowing you to easily prepare the necessary shipment documents and tracking your parcel.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user will gain access to important features for the easy handling and sending parcels.

module.name: erpillicopresta
module.description: Ahorre tiempo en la gestión de su e-shop con el 1er ERP gratuito y modulable: Pedidos de clientes, envíos, proveedores, gestión y exportación de stock, inventario..
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ahorre tiempo en la gestión de su e-shop con el 1er ERP gratuito y modulable: Pedidos de clientes, envíos, proveedores, gestión y exportación de stock, inventario...
module.additional_description: De la profesionalización de la gestión de sus pedidos de clientes y proveedores a la configuración avanzada de sus fichas de proveedores pasando por la gestión y la exportación del stock y la realización de su inventario, el pack 1-Click ERP será su socio privilegiado para gestionar su tienda de forma sencilla y eficaz. ¡La gestión de su back-office ya no será motivo de preocupación! El pack 1-Click ERP le permitirá ganar un tiempo muy valioso en la gestión de su comercio electrónico: ¡¡Hasta 2 horas al día según los comerciantes usuarios!!

module.name: loyaltylion
module.description: Añada a su tienda un programa de fidelización en unos minutos
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Añada a su tienda un programa de fidelización en unos minutos. Aumente las ventas y la satisfacción de sus clientes ofreciendo puntos por inscripciones, reseñas, visitas, recomendaciones y compras. Los clientes reúnen puntos y los canjean por cupones con los que comprar en su tienda, lo que incrementa las compras recurrentes. Consiga información sobre sus clientes, como los que más recomiendan y los que más gastan. Personalice su diseño y texto para que se ajusten a su tienda.
module.additional_description: Aumente el volumen de la cesta de la compra en una media de 9,4 %Aumente las ventas gracias a las compras recurrentesConsiga nuevos clientes mediante nuestra opción de recomendaciones a amigosAumente la satisfacción de los clientesDiferencie su tienda frente a las de sus competidoresLlegue a miles de personas en las redes sociales: lea un estudio de caso de una tienda que llegó a más de 10 000 personas en 3 meses ¿Por qué nosotros? LoyaltyLion tiene la confianza de cientos de tiendas de comercio electrónico en todo el mundo. Desde tiendas medianas y pequeñas a la mayor de Europa.

module.name: sellstrom
module.description: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Simplify your shipping process and save money.  PrestaShop and Sellstrom Global Shipping have partnered to offer you a fast and efficient solution to your shipping needs. Our module simplifies your shipping process by automatically creating your shipping labels.  Your customers choose the desired carrier and service from our multicarrier platform -- USPS, UPS, FedEx and DHL services.  Once your customer completes their order, the shipping label is automatically created and available for you to print within the order section of your PrestaShop Store.  Completely automated and hassle free!!!
module.additional_description: Your customers choose from 4 carriers – USPS, UPS, FedEx, DHL.Full USPS service selectionSave time and reduce errors.  The shipping label is auto created from the customer orderDomestic or international shipmentsRate customizationTry the SGS Module for the 1st month for free.  The module is $9.95 per month

module.name: nostotagging
module.description: Nosto es la forma más secilla de ofrecer experiencias de compra personalizadas en cualquier dispositivo. EMPIEZA HOY TUS 14 DIAS DE PRUEBA. NO REQUIERE TARJETA DE CREDITO
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nosto es la forma más secilla de ofrecer experiencias de compra personalizadas en cualquier dispositivo. EMPIEZA HOY TUS 14 DIAS DE PRUEBA. NO REQUIERE TARJETA DE CREDITO.
module.additional_description: Aumenta tus ventas online y ofrécele una mejor experiencia de compra a tus visitantesAumenta el valor medio de cada pedido con recomendaciones cross-selling y up-sellingIncrementa la tasa de conversión y la retención de clientes con recomendaciones personalizadasDescubre, en tiempo real, cómo se comportan tus visitantes a través de nuestro panel de controlPaga solo un pequeño % de las ventas que Nosto te ayuda a generar

module.name: powatag
module.description: Powa está trabajando con PrestaShop para revolucionar el comportamiento de compra de los consumidores
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Powa está trabajando con PrestaShop para revolucionar el comportamiento de compra de los consumidores. Al añadir PowaTag a su plataforma de comercio electrónico, puede ofrecer a los clientes una experiencia de proceso de checkout totalmente optimizada.
module.additional_description: Gracias a PowaTag, podrá: • Aumentar las tasas de conversión de ventas por móvil y en línea • Permitir que los clientes compren directamente de las páginas de productos • Permitir que los clientes descarguen su catálogo y compren con el móvil cuando mejor les venga a ellos • Experimentar una solución omnicanal que realmente abre canales de ventas nuevos, los cuales generan ingresos nuevos para usted PowaTag: la solución completa para las tiendas y las marcas

module.name: olark
module.description: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Olark live chat is the easiest way to boost your sales, help solve issues and understand your customers. Give your customers the answers they need immediately and gain powerful insights about what they want for relationships that last.
module.additional_description: Easily chat with your customers and make the sale!Targeted Chat rules to interact only with the customers that perform certain actionsCustomize the design to match your website color palletteAdvanced Reporting for awesome operator insightsAdvanced JavaScript API for deeper integrations

module.name: easymarketing
module.description: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yours
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: NEW: easymarketing - the smart way to advertise on Google Shopping Instantly more effective online campaigns with 38%* lower customer acquisition cost -*Google Benchmark, 2015 Prove it yourself - Sign-up for a free, 2 months trial
module.additional_description: easymarketing is the exclusive Google SBM Premium Partner in the UK easymarketing’s technology manages your Google Shopping campaign to maximise both impact & sales We take the worry out of online marketing saving YOU time & money   Get YOUR ad campaigns onlineConnecting to your Web-shopManaging your Data FeedCreating your CampaignsUploading onto Google & facebook  Maximise YOUR sales & minimise YOUR customer acquisition cost Not only does easymarketing’s state of the art technology offer a 38% lower customer acquisition cost* right from the start, - it is also recommended & fully supported by Google with the highest certification levelManaging your marketing campaignsOptimising CPC biddingOptimising to impact sales - constantly

module.name: brinkscheckout
module.description: Brink’s Checkout, un servicio de Brink’s Global Payments, le permite a comerciantes de 200 países aceptar pagos en línea de sus clientes a nivel mundial, en varias divisas e idiomas y a través de los
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Brink’s Checkout, un servicio de Brink’s Global Payments, le permite a comerciantes de 200 países aceptar pagos en línea de sus clientes a nivel mundial, en varias divisas e idiomas y a través de los métodos de pago más utilizados (Visa, MasterCard, American Express, Diners, Discover, JCB, PayPal, tarjeta de debido). Adicionalmente, Brink’s Checkout incluye un sistema innovador para prevención de fraudes. Usted tendrá acceso a todo esto a un precio bajo, simple y por transacción.
module.additional_description: Procesamiento de pagos todo-en-uno – Obtenga sin costo alguno todo lo que necesita para comenzar a aceptar pagos ahora mismo: portal de pago y procesamiento, cuenta comercial, prevención de fraudes y modulo para Prestashop.Maximice conversiones – La experiencia de pago sin contratiempo le provee a sus clientes distintas opciones de pagos, incluyendo la habilidad de pagar en varias divisas.Maximice sus ventas con Brink’s Checkout – venda en más de 200 países, procesando pagos en 26 divisas y en 15 idiomas.Minimice el fraude y brinde seguridad - Brink’s Checkout es la única plataforma de pago en línea con más de 15 años de experiencia, vendiendo internacionalmente. La tecnología patentada y nuestras 300 variables, le dan la confianza de vender globalmente de forma conveniente y fiable. Adicionalmente, nuestros especialistas en fraudes, revisan cada una de las transacciones para ofrecerle la tranquilidad mental que necesita para dedicarse a su negocio.

module.name: dotpay
module.description: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Dotpay enables fast and handy Internet payments accepting for sellers in e-shop based on PrestaShop. Start your account and see how much you may earn accepting payments online via Dotpay!
module.additional_description: Cooperation between Dotpay and PrestaShop is an answer for sellers needs who minimalizing efforts want to increase their selling opportunities. The possibilities offered by PrestaShop are not limited only to basic Internet shop functions. They offer many more - versatile offer of developing an offer, sales analyses, banner systems applying and comments, RSS channels or goods comparison. A useful functionality is individual creation of graphics changing this way the e-shop looks. What is more, the program may be developed by external modules.

module.name: sarbacanedesktop
module.description: Aprovecha 500 emails gratis en el módulo ! Crea y envía fácilmente newsletters magníficas para informar y fidelizar tus clientes. El módulo sincroniza tu tienda Prestashop con la aplicación Mailify
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Aprovecha 500 emails gratis en el módulo ! Crea y envía fácilmente newsletters magníficas para informar y fidelizar tus clientes. El módulo sincroniza tu tienda Prestashop con la aplicación Mailify.
module.additional_description: Asistencia: soporte técnico multilingüe a tu disposición - teléfono y emailnumerosas fuentes en líneavídeos, tutoriales, guías, consejos... Simplicidad: crea fácilmente magníficas newsletters responsive gracias al EmailBuilder Entregabilidad óptima: Tus clientes reciben realmente tus emails Funcionalidades avanzadas: personalización, segmentación, split-test...

module.name: prestashippingeasy
module.description: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: ShippingEasy automates your shipping across all major carriers. Orders download in real time and rules streamline carrier, service and package selections. Quickly fulfill orders placed on your website and marketplaces, including eBay, Amazon, Sears, Newegg and more. An easy to use system backed by exceptional service from shipping specialists. And, the best USPS rates - up to 46% off. FREE starter plan for up to 50 packages a month.
module.additional_description: Prestashop + ShippingEasy = the right combination for easy, fast, shipping with built-in savings  Sync all your orders in one locationSave up to 46% with the best USPS ratesEasy carrier integration with USPS, UPS and FedExFREE starter plan for up to 50 shipments per monthExceptional customer support Prestashop syncs automatically with ShippingEasy, downloading in all your order details in minutes and helping you assign shipping preferences, rates and delivery options in real-time. No cut and paste. No manual update. Save up to 46% Finally, access to competitive USPS rates – in fact, the cheapest around. For example: USPS Priority Mail: Medium Flat Rate box: retail $12.35, our price: $10.65 – a savings of $1.70 on a single shipment. Built in savings! All part of the service.

module.name: reforestaction
module.description: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop
module.author: 202 ecommerce
module.description_full: Adopt an ecofriendly image and optimize your online reputation for free: give your customers the opportunity to plant a tree for €1 when purchasing on your shop.
module.additional_description: With the module Responsible Purchase by Reforest' Action, your customers can plant a tree in the world to compensate the CO2 emissions of their purchase. Thanks to you, they act for the planet and they let it know on Facebook and Twitter. So you get better visibility on the Internet, free of charge.

module.name: expressmailing
module.description: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: First Marketing & Newsletter module fully integrated with the PrestaShop interface, including emailing with 9,000 free emails per month i.e. 300 per day, and the possibility to send FAX and SMS at very low prices.
module.additional_description: With more than 13 years of experience in direct marketing, we provide the ideal tool to broadcast your marketing campaigns (emailing, faxing & Sms). Fully integrated with PrestaShop Express-Mailing module allows you to precisely select recipients of the campaigns from your PrestaShop customers or visitors by using various filters. You can easily send them newsletters, discounts or special offers, report your season sales or announce your corporate events. Quick and intuitive, you can send your email campaigns to 200 or even 10 000 contacts in less than 5 minutes. Experience the Express-Mailing module now, and boost your sales !

module.name: bpostshm
module.description: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: bpost Shipping Manager is a solution that allows to easily integrate delivery functionalities in your webshop. Not only are the different delivery methods (to home or office location, to a parcel locker or a postal point) immediately available in your shop, you can also manage most of the settings directly via the Prestashop backend, print the labels and access the Track & Trace. The add-on is free of charge, still a contract with bpost should be signed in order to have access to the bpost logistical solutions.
module.additional_description: -       Easy set-up, plug & play -       Responsive design -       All bpost delivery methods are immediately available:@home@bpostParcels lockerInternational-       Configure prices per delivery method, independently and directly in the module -       Use most common options for your sendings (signature, basic insurance, automatic second presentation) -       Print directly from the backend -       Track & Trace your parcels from the backend

module.name: ovhhosting
module.description: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Your online store is too slow? OVH offers hosting solutions optimized for the needs of a prestashop store with free installation and support 24/7.

module.name: dpdfrance
module.description: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Use the DPD France module to add several delivery options to your check-out: pick-up points, home addresses, business addresses, etc. Enjoy an automated system for managing back-office orders. Choose a high-quality service, choose DPD France: deliveries in 24/48 hours, detailed tracking information online, local support and more. Integrate our module in just a few clicks and enjoy several innovative delivery options to satisfy your customers.

module.name: mercadopagobr
module.description: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: MercadoPago payment module: receive payments with a customizable and standard checkout, and bar code payment. MercadoPago provide the highest security standard with PCI Level 1 certification and an internal robust fraud analysis. With MercadoPago, you can accept major credit card brands, offer installments options and receive all funds upfront, and allow consumers to pay in websites or mobiles. Credit Card Customized Checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized checkout for credit card payment. Thus, it will be possible to customize its look and feel, customers won’t be redirected away to complete the payment, and it will also reduce the checkout steps improving conversion rate. Customized Bar Code Payment: this feature will allow merchants to have a customized bar code payment. It reduces the checkout steps improving conversion rates. The bar code payment can be also customized with the merchant's logo. Standard checkout: this feature will allow merchants to have a standard checkout. It includes all payment methods (i.e. all credit cards, bar code payment, account money) and all window types (i.e. redirect, iframe and modal). Customization is not possible for this type of checkout. Sign up here!
module.additional_description: MercadoPago can help Prestashop’s merchants increase their sales with its cutting edge payment technology, providing solutions that fit with the clients’ needs:  - Online and real-time payment processing- High approval rate through an internal robust fraud analyses - High conversion with our customized checkout- Customizable bar code payment - Potential new consumers due to our large user base – 120 million in Latin America- Highest Level 1 PCI certification- Major credit card brands acceptance- Payment in installments- Two-day or fourteen day funding*- Omni-channel payment system for website and mobiles- One-click to pay with MercadoPago’s standard checkout- Sellers protection program*- Easy to install module  * According to MercadoPago’s terms and conditions.

module.name: chronopost
module.description: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Offer the services of the leading express shipper to individuals in France! Offer the choice and flexibility of multi-choice delivery: ship to a home, a pickup point, or an office!
module.additional_description: Choose the carrier that delivers more than 80 million packages per year and serves 230 countries.Save time with simplified managementGet real-time tracking of your shipments

module.name: dpdgroup
module.description: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop
module.author: Invertus
module.description_full: Shipment management has never been faster or easier than with the DPD’s module for PrestaShop. All necessary tools for preparation and tracking of parcels have been consolidated and can be managed from one single interface.
module.additional_description: Once the module has been installed and configured, the user gains access to functionalities which make shipment management easy. This solution will help optimize and automatize the shop’s performance when it comes to handling and sending parcels, including:  printing of waybills (label, delivery of goods protocol)ordering courierstracking your parcelsviewing shipment history

module.name: zeleriscarrier
module.description: Módulo que integra a Zeleris como proveedor de transporte de la tienda online. El módulo permite la integración directa de las órdenes de envío con el Sistema de Transporte de Zeleris
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Módulo que integra a Zeleris como proveedor de transporte de la tienda online. El módulo permite la integración directa de las órdenes de envío con el Sistema de Transporte de Zeleris.
module.additional_description: El módulo de Prestashop de Zeleris permite una integración rápida y sencilla de la tienda online con el Sistema de Transporte de Zeleris. El módulo añade también múltiples funcionalidades que simplifican la gestión del transporte dentro de la tienda online. Zeleris (Telefónica Servicios Integrales de Distribución, S.A.U.), es la empresa del Grupo Telefónica especializada en la prestación de servicios de Logística y Transporte nacional e internacional para particulares y empresas. Zeleris cuenta en su cartera de clientes con varias de las empresas más importantes de España en el ámbito del comercio electrónico y la venta a distancia, y es el proveedor logístico de referencia del Grupo Telefónica en España.

module.name: nimblepayment
module.description: Nimble Payments es una pasarela de pago online que cuenta con el soporte de BBVA y que te permite aceptar pagos online de forma ágil y segura
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Nimble Payments es una pasarela de pago online que cuenta con el soporte de BBVA y que te permite aceptar pagos online de forma ágil y segura. Con servicios que facilitan la gestión de tu negocio: atención cualificada en español y, próximamente, financiación a tu medida

module.name: protectedshops
module.description: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy po
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Automatically protected against legal proceedings with the AGB Connect ® module Protected Shops offers an online service for creation of legal texts like terms and conditions, imprint, privacy policy and many more. Automatic update.  2 months for free for PrestaShop users!
module.additional_description: Individual legal texts through questionnaires creation The survey considers the characteristics of the different countries, payment procedures, logistic providers, tracking solutions, social networks and can easily generate the legal texts for nearly every individual business model legally correct.   Automatic update when new laws or court decisions become effective The maintenance happens independently from the online traders. The module synchronizes the legal texts regularly with the servers of Protected Shops and cares for the actuality of the legal texts. The trader can decide which documents he wants to use and the frequency of the updating can be determined by the customer himself. The update is necessary when new laws or court decisions become effective, so that the online shop is always up to date. At that point, online traders are protected against legal proceedings.

module.name: shiptomyid
module.description: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Ship2MyID allows shipping without an address. Generate new transactions that were not possible before. Enable REAL gifting by delivering gifts to cell numbers, or emails, social ID of the receiver.  A PrestaShop store will increase consumer’s ability to send gifts up to 98%, and speed up mobile checkout by 75x.

module.name: liveperson
module.description: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: LiveEngage is the modern way to connect with your online shoppers.  Increase sales conversions and overall satisfaction. The single user, free plan is totally free for one user, who can take unlimited chats with as many people at a time. Plus, we aren’t limiting any features, so you get full access to all of LiveEngage.
module.additional_description: LivePerson LiveEngage is the modern way to talk to visitors on your online store and on their mobile devices.  Stores that connect with their customers in real-time see an increase in conversions and overall satisfaction.

module.name: mobfirst
module.displayName: MobFirst - Native Mobile Apps to your PrestaShop
module.description: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Best mobile solution for your store. The most complete iPhone and Android apps published for Prestashop. Automatically integrated by the click of a button. We built beautiful, easy-to-use, mobile commerce apps for your PrestaShop store.
module.additional_description: Always with your client: Being constantly in touch with your customers through mobile apps has become increasingly common for companies who want to build customer loyalty.With you apps, customers can be directly activated at any time through PUSH notifications. Tell them about your new products, promos and campaigns. Make them loyal customers. Higher Conversion Rates: Apps have an average 40% greater conversion rate compared to responsive websites. Don’t miss any sales, use your full revenue potential. Branding: Having an app is more than just sales, it’s a statement of your commitment, quality and care for all of your customers. The largest ecommerces already know it, and now it’s your chance of having an exclusive app for your store. Fast support: 100% of our customers get an answer within 24 hours (workdays) to help you as quickly as possible get your apps published. Pricing: For only $149/month you will have your own app, customized according to your visual identity and fully integrated with you PrestaShop store.

module.name: stickngo
module.description: The StickN’Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the StickN’Go sheet
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The StickN’Go sheets allow you to have in a unique document your order form and your delivery label! Simple, 2 in 1, without any configuration, neither module addition, the StickN’Go sheets have been developed together with PrestaShop teams Your client's delivery address is perfectly printed on a removable label . No operations is required to use the StickN’Go sheets. TRY StickN'Go NOW, RECEIVE YOUR PACK ( Free delivery)

module.name: securitypatch
module.description: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015
module.author: PrestaShop
module.description_full: This module solves a security issue for PrestaShop 1.4, 1.5, and 1.6. Install this module, and it will apply the security patch that was released in late July 2015. You can learn more about the issue by reading the security announcement.

module.name: openpayprestashop
module.description: Acepte múltiples métodos de pagos en un instante como: tarjetas de crédito/débito, pagos en efectivo en mas de 12,000 tiendas de conveniencia y transferencias interbancarias (SPEI), todo con notificac
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Acepte múltiples métodos de pagos en un instante como: tarjetas de crédito/débito, pagos en efectivo en mas de 12,000 tiendas de conveniencia y transferencias interbancarias (SPEI), todo con notificaciones de pago en tiempo real.
module.additional_description: Este modulo le permite soportar 3 diferentes medios de pagos directamente en su sitio teniendo una cuenta con Openpay. El usuario selecciona o realiza el pago directamente en el proceso de pago sin dejar su sitio, resultando una mejor experiencia para el usuario y mas conversiones exitosas para usted.

module.name: mediafinanz
module.description: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing
module.author: Silbersaiten
module.description_full: Your customer is not paying? This free-of-charge mediafinanz module will enable you to transfer outstanding claims from your order overview to the collection experts for further processing. You will manage and control your claims from your back office.
module.additional_description: YOUR ADVANTAGES A free-of-charge collection module for your PrestaShopMore resources for your core businessHigher realisation rates by means of long-term experience in online collectionMaintenance of your long-term customer relationsOutstanding IT and data securityProfessional, personal adviceStaff with sound legal experience The outsourcing of the extra-judicial collection of your outstanding claims will save your time and valuable internal resources. Our processes are fully automated and based on state of the art software technology with high data security. The TÜV-certified collection solution, which does not involve any cost risk, can be optimally integrated into your existing shop work flow. mediafinanz does not just think of itself as a collection agent for you, but as your active companion. Our approach is designed to achieve settlement by agreement. We strive to find solutions acceptable to both parties, to ensure existing customer relations are not prejudiced, and to collect receivables at an early stage of the collection management. NO COST RISKMembership not requiredNo basic subscriptionNo lump sum payment on non-collectable itemsNo success based fees Button to the registration module Register now free-of-charge! More than 25,000 clients rely on us. Why not experience a new kind of freedom as well!

module.name: creditfr
module.description: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: You are entrepreneur, craftsman or merchant and you have development projects for your organization ? Looking for alternatives and affordable financing?
module.additional_description: Borrow directly from individuals at competitive rates Thanks to a new type of financing without any bank ! Enjoy a quick and easy credit, seamlessly You make an online request to immediately know your eligibility to our financing offer. You get a response within 48 hours. You know exactly how many fees you will pay and you can follow your transaction 100% online via your customer space on Credit.fr Finance all your development projects With Credit.fr, you can finance different kind of projects:Any type of material (Computer Telephony, Medical Office, Medical,)Machine & ToolIntangible / WebsiteTourism / Utility / Industrial VehicleWorks / Facilities / Real EstateBusiness Takeover (the target must be over 4 years)Franchise / Admission Feed (franchisor of over 4 years)Research & DevelopmentBuyout of Partners Current Accounts

module.name: oneandonehosting
module.description: En 1&1 encontrarás el pack de hosting que mejor se adapta a tus necesidades
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: En 1&1 encontrarás el pack de hosting que mejor se adapta a tus necesidades. Crea tu tienda PrestaShop fácilmente gracias a la “instalación en un clic”
module.additional_description: Descubre las ventajas del Nuevo Hosting de 1&1:Hasta 40 Aplicaciones Click & Build como PrestaShopSoporte Especializado en Apps: nuestros expertos estarán a tu disposición las 24 horas del día, los 7 días de la semana para asesorarte en la instalación y gestión de tus aplicacionesMáxima seguridad gracias a la georredundancia. Tu web se almacenará en dos centros de datos independientesEscáneres de seguridad 1&1 SiteLock incluidos para una seguridad total2 GB de RAM dedicada garantizados para un rendimiento máximo (solo en el pack 1&1 Unlimited Plus)

module.name: convermax
module.description: Our flagship product, Convermax, is an enhanced Site Search product that delivers the right results fast
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Our flagship product, Convermax, is an enhanced Site Search product that delivers the right results fast. Its intuitive and easy to use interface lets customers use multi-dimensional search to find what they need.
module.additional_description: Shoppers have been "Google-ized" and expect relevant results fast. Online shopping should be fun and easy, and with Convermax, they get the relevant results quickly. The entire experience is designed to help increase sales conversions.

module.name: checkyourdata
module.displayName: Accurate Google Analytics Reports by Check Your Data
module.description: Discover the real return on your marketing investments: collect 100% of your sales data in Google Analytics to get the most of your reports with clean, accurate and reliable data
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Discover the real return on your marketing investments: collect 100% of your sales data in Google Analytics to get the most of your reports with clean, accurate and reliable data.
module.additional_description: Check Your Data optimizes your data before sending them to Google Analytics: you now get the data from all sales made on your ecommerce website. You are therefore able to focus on the ROI of your marketing actions.    The module handles errors due to:  Non-return customer to the shop after payment on an external websitepayments by ckeck or bank transfersMultiple calls to the confirmation page for the same transactionOr errors due to misconfigured payment modules   Check Your Data takes into account cancellation orders, partial and full refunds. We push these data directly into your ecommerce analytics reports.   Thanks to all these optimizations you are able to make decisions with reliable KPIs and measure the true ROI of your webmarketing actions.

module.name: remarkety
module.description: Remarkety will help you grow sales by over 30% sending personalized and targeted emails based on customer behavior and purchase history
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Remarkety will help you grow sales by over 30% sending personalized and targeted emails based on customer behavior and purchase history.
module.additional_description: Deliver Product Recommendations Automatically suggest products your customers might like in emails to cross-sell and up-sell Send Personalized Coupons Send personalized coupon codes to your customers to increase purchase rate Win Back Inactive Customers Deliver emails that urge sleeping customers to visit your website and purchase Recover Abandoned Carts Automatically email customers with images, links and prices of products they left in their cart Nurture Leads Automatically deliver emails to prospects and leads after they sign up for your newsletter Targeted Email Blasts & Newsletters Segment by customer behavior and purchases to send relevant and personalized emails Beautiful Reporting Dashboard Intuitive dashboard displays essential analytics including purchase rate on every campaign HTML Template Editor Use pre-made templates or design your own with the template editor Proactive Feedback & Marketing Ideas Recieve weekly tuning adjustments to improve email campaign performance

module.name: alipay
module.description: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading ePayment solution for China, processing roughly 50% of the total online transactions. It is a secure and convenient solution and preferred by over 400 million active members.
module.additional_description: What is Alipay? Alipay is an affiliate of Alibaba Group and the leading third-party online payment solution for China. The significantly growing interest by Chinese shoppers in Western brands create large opportunities for Western companies with 67% of Chinese luxury spending occurring outside Chinese borders. If you are offering maternity products, food supplements, fashion, beauty or jewellery, Alipay will create an astonishing opportunity for you, opening up the Chinese market.

module.name: amzpayments
module.description: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts
module.author: Patworx Multimedia
module.description_full: Amazon Payments makes it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay on third party websites using the payment and shipping information stored in their Amazon accounts. Amazon Payments can help merchants add new customers, increase sales and turn casual browsers into buyers. It’s fast, easy and trusted — leverage the Amazon brand to grow your business. If you are based in the UK please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments  If you are based in the USA please use this link here to register to Amazon Payments
module.additional_description: Make it easy for millions of Amazon customers to login and pay in your Prestashop shop, using the addresses and payment information stored in their Amazon accounts. It's fast, simple and secure.

module.name: safeshops
module.description: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: With a SafeShops Label you will fully comply with Belgian and European law. After filling in a questionnaire with tips, an independent law firm will lead you through the legal jungle and provide you with the necessary documents like general conditions, privacy/cookie policies. So, join the fastest growing label community of Belgium and enhance trust in your online sales.
module.additional_description: Why choose this service?   °Boost your customer relations °Enhance trust °Alleviate customer disputes   Choose the SafeShops Label and:   ° Promote confidence in your webshop ° Take advantage of personal legal support ° Receive e-commerce general conditions and standard documents in 4 languages. ° Increase your cross-border sales with the Emota Label ° Be part of a very dynamic e-community ° Take part in the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights (www.shoppingnights.be) ° Avoid fines and complaints.   Choose the SafeShops Label and avoid extra legal costs.   Webshops have to comply with manifold legislation.  European, local and sector bound legislation will vary…   This is the reason why Prestashop collaborates with SafeShops.  SafeShops  will  give you legal advise by setting-up your webshop.  You will receive general conditions and a privacy policy (D/Fr/E/G) that can be adapted to your specific case, in dialog with an independent lawyer.  SafeShops keeps you informed about the ever changing legislation.  SafeShops Label enhances your consumer confidence.  All this for € 295/year.   European Label as a bonus SafeShops is accredited in Europe, you will also obtain the European Emota Label. This is a nice bonus for those eager to do business abroad.   Knowledge exchange in an accessible and open community SafeShops represents more than a Label.  Besides the open community with the label certification, our free SafeShops Café offers you interesting presentations from partners and other webshops.  You will also enjoy discounts on trainings, seminars and conferences.      Inclusive our 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights Safeshops also organizes yearly the 7 Sleepless Shopping Nights.  A campaign (radio and e-mail) where you can highlight your webshop during 7 nights and gather some extra attention.  All included in the certification cost. For more information please visit www.shoppingnight.be.

module.name: becommerce
module.description: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux
module.author: PrestaShop Partners
module.description_full: The BeCommerce Label is a quality mark for online shopping of products and services in the BeLux. The BeCommerce Label demonstrates that your company complies with the BeCommerce Label Code and that your e-commerce site was certified by an independent organisation i.e. Bureau Veritas. With the BeCommerce Label members inform the consumer that they provide a reliable and secure way of online shopping.
module.additional_description: ​Advantages •        As a member you are allowed to display the BeCommerce Quality label. Research has demonstrated that the BeCommerce Quality label stands for reliability and safety. 83% of the consumers know/recognise the BeCommerce Quality label and 72% take the BeCommerce Quality label into account for online purchases. The BeCommerce Quality label provides consumers’ trust and contributes to higher conversion, therefore more turnover. •        BeCommerce manages the interests of the members by – among others – influencing the (new) law and regulations. It also regularly takes part in conversations with the various parties around the e-commerce market. •        With the membership and the BeCommerce Quality label, you show you comply with the law and regulations. You can apply the Terms & Conditions of BeCommerce. BeCommerce has the compliance of laws and regulations as single quality mark independently checked through the certification carried out by Bureau Veritas. This too increases the consumers’ trust in your online shop. •        You entitle the consumer to independent mediation, if you and the consumer have a dispute about the purchase. BeCommerce mediates with experienced solicitors and employees. This ensures very few complaints end up in a legal dispute. Should it go that far, BeCommerce is the only quality mark to provide independent dispute settlement. •        As a BeCommerce member you will enjoy knowledge and information share with other members. You receive free tests, white papers and publications, have access to the exclusive members network and you can participate in work groups (interest management). BeCommerce organises workshops and conventions in which you can participate and network free of charge or on a discount.
